name: Quicktest.js
tagline: Sometimes you just need to set up some quick unit tests
body:
### Quicktest.js

#### Example
    Quicktest(
        'A few quick tests',
        [
        4+2, 6, //test 1
        2+2, 5  //test 2
        ], 
        alert
    );

#### Example output

    A few quick tests
    =================
    
    - Fail (test 2): Expected 5, but got 4
    Of 2 tests, 1 passed and 1 failed.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
